General.Name: Rosseti Yug PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Rosseti South, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the electric power transmission and distribution in Russia. It is also involved in the power grids working capacity assurance, telephone service, and commercial activities and management consulting activities. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Rostov-on-Don, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Rosseti South is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.
